data.name: CHORIZO
data.detailed_description:
Play as one of four dirtbags on a tear through La Correa, a city in the thrall of El Lobo and his Five Knuckles and held together by the firm belief that fight makes right. Team up with friends, slug it out in-person or online, or go it alone. And no matter what you choose, recruit a crew of degenerates to dominate in the streets and the ring.




  • Chorizo
    Son of a fighter, a nobody with no purpose and lower patience on a search for meaning with his fists and high-flying attacks. Enjoys cheap beers, trash talk, and his shroominal, Onion.

  • Arma de Dios
    The Dillo Daddy, God’s Weapon, the Padre of Pain -- Arma fights for three things: fame, fortune, and the adoration of his devoted public. Lately these have been in short supply, and he’s here to take them back -- with the power of god and a whole lotta muscle.

  • Sindina
    People fight for different reasons... ideals, personal gain, sometimes for the thrill alone. Sindina’s personal preference is pain. Specifically dealing it out to others, and lots of it. With speed, tooth, and nail, she aims to bring the hurt to the streets of La Correa.

  • Detective Moss
    His origins mysterious, his motives unknown, his clothing of questionable cleanliness -- Detective Moss is a deceptively slow and slightly smelly enigma. With some concerning habits and tricks up his very long sleeves, his goals are his own.



Recruit those you punch-up into your squad and form your own deck of brawlers, primed to assist you in campaign play or bring them into the ring online.



The streets are better with someone at your back. Link up for a remote session online, or sit down for some classic couch co-op. And with our local tag-team system, you and a friend can team up to take on others around the world from the comfort of the same couch, bar stools, or other seating device of your choice.



Head into the ring to square up one on one, or tag in with a friend for 2v2 matches. Bring your custom deck of street brawlers with you to complement your fighter, or counter your opponents’. And when you’re ready, head into the big leagues and vie for the ultimate prize: the La Correa Champion’s Belt.



Stay and finish the fight; GGPO netcode more solid than your dad's abs ensures that the match stays even and connected, making you feel as if you’re punching your pals right there on that greasy old couch next to you.



These ain’t your papa’s pixels. Inspired by a webcomic that started out scribbled on barroom napkins, Chorizo aims to carry that same energy into its visuals, providing a rough and tumble look like it was ripped right off the page and shoved into a neo geo.



  • Customize your own backyard brawl pit, so that when you give someone the beatdown of their probably not particularly successful fighting career, they know whose turf they lost on.
  • Maximize your fighters' aesthetics with a variety of unlockable skins from singleplayer, PvP, and secret ones to be discovered.
  • Restore the Ugly Mug’s jukebox back to its former glory by bringing back the vinyl that some enterprising patron pawned. You know what they say, wax sounds best when you have to knockout like sixty dudes to get it.

data.short_description: Fight side by side and head to head with claw, fang, and a whole lot of bad attitude in CHORIZO, a multiplayer wrestling beat'em up. Play in singleplayer, 4-player co-op, and PvP; or take the fight online with seamless rollback netcode. Build your team and fight to be La Correa's top street dog.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1060 GTX
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: The better the card the more bangin' these sick tunes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

release_date.date: Early Access sometime in Fall 2022, you animals

content_descriptors.notes:
Cussin', swearin', general profanities and unpleasantness.

Occasional comments of a rude and sexual nature.
